pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# Tiptapy### Library that generates HTML output from JSON export of tiptap editor ![tiptapy](https://github.com/scrolltech/tiptapy/workflows/tiptapy/badge.svg)### Install ```bashpip install tiptapy```### Test```bashpython -m pytest```### Usage``` {.sourceCode .python}import tiptapys = """{ "type": "doc", "content": [ { "type": "blockquote", "content": [ { "type": "paragraph", "content": [ { "type": "text", "text": "Readability counts." } ] }, { "type": "paragraph", "content": [ { "type": "text", "marks": [ { "type": "link", "attrs": { "href": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zen_of_Python" } } ], "text": "Zen of Python" }, { "type": "text", "text": " By " }, { "type": "text", "marks": [ { "type": "bold" } ], "text": "Tom Peters" } ] } ] } ]}"""class config: """ Config class to store constants used by the other nodes. """ DOMAIN = "python.org"renderer = tiptapy.BaseDoc(config)out = renderer.render(s)print(out)```#### Output``` {.sourceCode .html}

Readability counts.

Zen of Python By Tom Peters

```
